0.9.name: wordpress/wp-ladda-buttons-with-built-in-loading-indicators
0.9.description:
A set of buttons which merge loading indicators into themselves to bridge the gap between action and feedback.

Ladda buttons must be given the class "ladda-button" and the button label needs to have the "ladda-label" class.

Accepted Data Styles

  • expand-left
  • expand-right
  • expand-up
  • expand-down
  • contract
  • contract-overlay
  • zoom-in
  • zoom-out
  • slide-left
  • slide-right
  • slide-up
  • slide-down

Accepted Data Colors

  • green
  • red
  • blue
  • purple
  • mint

Accepted Data Sizes

  • xs
  • s
  • l
  • xl

Below is an example of a button which will use the expand-right animation style.

<button data-style="expand-right" data-size="l" ><span>Submit</span></button>

Demo and detail information:
